tool_description: Get Information from Stock Market around the globe
name: Global Stock Market
title: Global Stock Market

api_list.name: Get Stock information
api_list.description:
Get one stock information from a specific market that could be:
- BVMF (B3 Bovespa)
- NYSE
- Nasdaq
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/b3/petr4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/{stock_market}/{stock_ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
